artistInfo2.biography: Métisse is an Irish/African Soul/Electronica band, formed by former Chapterhouse member Skully, and Aïda, a singer/choreographer from Côte d'Ivoire. They formed in Toulouse, France. The band's name is the French word for 'mixture', and its music is a mix of African, Celtic, soul and electronic music. Song lyrics often feature a mixture of Dioula, English and French words. The band achieved initial success with the single "Sousoundé". Its next hit Read more on Last.fm
